channel.title: [Class suggestion] The Attorney/Prosecutor
channel.description:
Attorney - Neutral Social Passive: Discovery - If someone is voted up to the stand you will immediately learn if they are Evil
Day Ability: Trollbox - Make someone say something (Unlimited)
Night Ability 1: Prepare alibi - Target will appear BD tonight. They will not appear as visiting to observers. (Resolves before frames) (Unlimited) Night Ability 2: Court reshuffle - Target cannot vote tomorrow. Your votes to Execute or pardon will count for 2 the next day.(Unlimited)
Goal: Ensure that no Evils are killed during the day.
Evils = Cult or Unseen
Prosecutor - Unseen Social
Day Ability: Trollbox - Make someone say something (Unlimited)
Night Ability 1: Fabricate evidence. Choose 2 targets. They will both be framed and will appear to be visiting each other. (Unlimited)
Night Ability 2: Court reshuffle - Target cannot vote tomorrow. Your votes to Execute or pardon will count for 2 the next day.(Unlimited)

item.title: [Class suggestion] The Attorney/Prosecutor
item.dc:creator: NuclearBurrito
item.description:
The idea is that you have troll box and tailor Ability’s that can make people seem innocent. Combine that with being able to steel the vote of the accuser and you actually have a shot at winning. There is also the existence of a converted form. In other words if an evil is executed early on you can try and get yourself converted and win that way instead.

After all how would the change you described work with the fool? Btw would like to point out that getting the Unseen/cult killed at night as fast as possible is a viable way to win.

Read full topic

item.title: [Class suggestion] The Attorney/Prosecutor
item.dc:creator: Livicus
item.description:
In my opinion this is a bit counter-intuitive; why not make it that, as a Neutral, he wants to help other Neutrals? This means Fool, Scorned, Merc, Alchemist. He’ll know if the person being voted up is a Neutral.

When there are confirmed Sheriffs/Paladins or Observers who know that the person is evil, it will be so much harder to accomplish your role. And the goal of an attorney, the best one, is to protect the innocent.

I think the goal should be changed so that no non-killing Neutral can be voted guilty during the day.
